mapper.select: select s.name shopName,s.logo shopLogoUrl from u_shop s,shake_prize l where s.id=l.provider_shopid and l.id=#{id}

SELECT m.name shopName,m.logo marketLogoUrl,m.address,a.name activityName,a.description,a.channel, a.is_default isDefault,a.start_date startTime,a.end_date endTime,a.id activityId, l.desc_clause 'desc',l.image_url imgUrl,l.main_info main,l.extend_info extend, l.start_time startTime,l.num,l.issue,l.end_time endTime,l.writeoff_position position,l.shareable shareAble FROM u_market m, shake_prize l, shake_activity a WHERE m.id = l.market_id AND l.activity_id = a.id AND l.id = #{id}

select l.prize_level level,l.coupon_type coupon,t.filepath template,l.end_time endTime, a.channel,a.is_default isDefault,a.id activityId from shake_prize l , shake_template t, shake_activity a where l.template_id=t.id and a.id = l.activity_id and l.id=#{id}
SELECT name FROM shake_prize ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 0,10
select count(i.id) from shake_prize_instance i,shake_prize l where i.prize_id=l.id and l.id=#{0} and i.open_id=#{1}
SELECT (num-issue) num FROM shake_prize WHERE id= #{id}
